meanings.definition: Low in position or status; humble or unimportant.
meanings.sent1: The lowliest flower in the garden still adds beauty.
meanings.sent2: She always helps the lowliest animals in need.
meanings.sent3: Even the lowliest ant can teach us about hard work.
meanings.sent4: In a world of stars, she shone as the lowliest moon.
meanings.sent5: The lowliest pebble on the beach has a story to tell.

meanings.definition: Of the lowest rank or order.
meanings.sent1: He was given the lowliest task in the group.
meanings.sent2: The lowliest soldier showed great courage in battle.
meanings.sent3: The lowliest coin in his pocket brought him luck.
meanings.sent4: In the kingdom, even the lowliest servant had a role to play.
meanings.sent5: The lowliest star in the sky still shines brightly at night.
